name: happy-db
description: A super lightweight multi-threaded 100% redis compatible no sql database written purely in NodeJS
author: steelbrain

scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p Dist; uc-compile Source/Main.js; uc-compile Source/Methods_Basic.js; uc-compile Source/Methods_Hash.js; uc-compile Source/Methods_List.js; uc-compile Source/Worker.js
